mapper.insert:
insert into product (product_name, product_shop, product_image, product_content, product_category, product_price )
values (#{productName},#{productShop},#{productImage},#{productContent},#{productCategory},#{productPrice});
mapper.update: update product set product_name= #{productName}, product_shop = #{productShop}, product_total = #{productTotal} ,product_image = #{productImage}, product_content = #{productContent}, product_category=#{productCategory},product_total=#{productTotal},product_price=#{productPrice},product_opt=#{productOpt} where product_id = #{productId}
update board set is_delete = #{isDelete},board_title=#{boardTitle},board_content = #{boardContent} where board_id =#{boardId}
mapper.select: select * from hotel_res hr INNER JOIN hotel_detail_res hdr ON hr.res_detail_num = hdr.res_detail_num INNER JOIN hotel_room hrm ON hdr.room_id = hrm.room_id INNER JOIN hotel_info hi ON hrm.hotel_id = hi.hotel_id where hdr.res_status = '예약중'
mapper.update: update detailorder set order_status = #{orderStatus} where product_id = #{productId}
